document_data.mainbody: '''''The Legend of Drizzt: The Crystal Shard''''' (original title: '''''Forgotten Realms: The Legend of Drizzt, Volume 4: The Crystal Shard''''') is the graphic novel version of [[R.A. Salvatore]]'s novel ''[[The Crystal Shard]]''. It was originally published in three parts: ''The Legend of Drizzt: The Crystal Shard'' #1–3.

document_data.Reprints: The ''[[The Legend of Drizzt: The Crystal Shard (graphic novel)|The Legend of Drizzt: The Crystal Shard Graphic Novel]]'' series was reprinted in 2007 as a paperback and hardcover omnbius by [[wikipedia:en:Devil's Due Publishing|Devil's Due Publishing]]. It was released as a paperback omnibus in June 2016 by [[wikipedia:en:IDW Publishing|IDW Publishing]].
